text: us waqt azeez misr ki biwi ne kaha yahi hai jin ke baare mein tum mujhe taane de rahi thi, main ne har chand us se apna matlab haasil karna chaha lekin ye baal baal bacha raha aur jo kuch main is se keh rahi hoon agar ye na karega to yaqinan ye khaid kar diya jayega aur beshak ye bahuth hee be-izzath hoga
